Linus and Luke discuss a disturbing trend where xAI’s Grok is being used to generate non-consensual sexual images after users discovered they could tag the bot to alter photos on X.

Linus and Luke discuss the new tech house, a recently purchased home that will serve as a real-world test bench for smart home tech, home theater setups, and other practical tech builds. They share first impressions of the house’s questionable DIY history, unexpected problems from the inspection report, and why taking on a slightly scary fixer-upper makes for better content than upgrading Linus’s own home yet again.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=433kipkEERY

Linus and Luke discuss the FCC’s move to block new foreign-made drones and critical components from entering the US market, a decision that heavily impacts DJI and raises national security concerns. They break down the real-world consequences for consumers and commercial operators, debate whether banning competition is the right solution, and question what this means for domestic drone manufacturing and innovation going forward.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=433kipkEERY
